department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Replacement of the doors of lock no.2 Canal-de-Lachine in Montreal
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Parks Canada, publishes this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) to obtain the services of a general contractor for the replacement work on the doors of lock no. 2 of the Lachine Canal in Montreal.
duration_in_months: Well-Delete this line as it's not useful for accurate calculations.
full_summary:
### Canada Government Tender Announcement

#### Replacement of the Doors of Lock No. 2, Lachine Canal

[translated]

**Publishing Entity:** Government of Canada (TPSGC)

**Publication Date:** October 16, 2023

#### Notice Type and Acquisition Method 

*   **Notice Type (English):** Request For Proposal
*   **Notice Type (French):** DEMANDE DE PROPOSITION (DDP)
*   **Acquisition Method (English):** **Competitive**
*   **Acquisition Method (French):** Concurrentielle

#### Project Details

*   **Project Title (English)**: Replacement of the doors of lock no. 2 of the Lachine Canal in Montreal
*   **Project Title (French):** Remplacement des portes de l’écluse no.2 du Canal-de-Lachine à Montréal
*   **Notice Reference Number (English):** WS4254215403-Doc4261022703
*   **Notice Reference Number (French):** WS4254215403 - Doc4261022703
*   **Notice Status (English):** Expirée
*   **Notice Status (French):** Expiré
*   **Notice Type Date:** 2023-10-16

#### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity (English):** Department of Public Works and Government Services
*   **Contracting Entity (French):** Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux
*   **Associated Entity (English):** Parks Canada Agency
*   **Associated Entity (French):** Agence Parcs Canada

#### Project Parameters

*   **Expected Start Date (English):** 2023-12-01
*   **Expected End Date (English):** 2025-05-28
*   **Bid Closing Date (English):** 2024-02-05T14:00:00
*   **Trade Agreements Engaged (English):** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   **
